title: Live updates: Lions, Texans clash in a potential Super Bowl preview
description: Jared Goff leads Detroit into Houston, looking for a seventh consecutive win. On the other side, C.J. Stroud and the Texans want to shake off an ugly loss. Follow all the action.
author: Yahoo Sports
excerpt: Jared Goff and C.J. Stroud face off in a battle of two of the league's premier QBs.
text: Just four of the NFL's 32 teams have yet to play in the Super Bowl, and two of them will take center stage in Week 10 on Sunday Night Football in what could be the matchup in New Orleans in February. The 7-1 Detroit Lions and 6-3 Houston Texans clash in Houston, and both have an eye on deep playoff runs this season. The Lions have been on fire, winning six straight and averaging 36 points per game over that span with victories over playoff contenders in the Vikings, Packers and Cardinals. Jared Goff is completing 83% of his passes on the win streak with 13 touchdowns and one interception.While C.J. Stroud gets the headlines in Houston â€” he's on pace for another 4,000-yard passing season â€” the Texans' defense has led the charge to sit atop the AFC South. Houston is second in the NFL in total defense, allowing just over 280 yards per game. Their young stars, like Jameson Williams are used to the marquee spotlight, and are looking to move even closer to securing a playoff berth.Sun, November 10, 2024 at 7:20 PM ESTTexans inactives for Sunday Night FootballSun, November 10, 2024 at 7:19 PM ESTLions inactives for Sunday Night Football
html:
Just four of the NFL's 32 teams have yet to play in the Super Bowl, and two of them will take center stage in Week 10 on Sunday Night Football in what could be the matchup in New Orleans in February. The 7-1 Detroit Lions and 6-3 Houston Texans clash in Houston, and both have an eye on deep playoff runs this season. The Lions have been on fire, winning six straight and averaging 36 points per game over that span with victories over playoff contenders in the Vikings, Packers and Cardinals. Jared Goff is completing 83% of his passes on the win streak with 13 touchdowns and one interception.

While C.J. Stroud gets the headlines in Houston â€” he's on pace for another 4,000-yard passing season â€” the Texans' defense has led the charge to sit atop the AFC South. Houston is second in the NFL in total defense, allowing just over 280 yards per game. The Texans are coming off a mini-bye, having last played Halloween night in a Thursday Night Football loss to the Jets in New York.

  • Time: 8:20 p.m. ET

  • Location: NRG Stadium | Houston

  • TV Channel: NBC

  • Streaming: Peacock, Fubo

Live6 updates

  • Sun, November 10, 2024 at 7:58 PM EST

    Is Detroit the best team in the NFL?

    They've certainly played like if over the past two months.

  • Sun, November 10, 2024 at 7:54 PM EST

    ðŸš¨ðŸš¨NICO COLLINS FANTASY MANAGERSðŸš¨ðŸš¨

  • Sun, November 10, 2024 at 7:52 PM EST

    C.J. Stroud is THE MAN in Houston

    Coming into the game a 6-3, the Texans can take a full, three-game lead in the AFC South, just 10 weeks into the season. They are coming off a shaky loss at the New York Jets on Thursday Night to open Week 9, but Stroud is looking to get back on track tonight against a Detroit team that hasn't been great against the pass this season, allowing 250.8 yards per game (29th in the league), but that's due â€” in part â€” to teams throwing to keep up with the explosive Detroit offense.

  • Sun, November 10, 2024 at 7:44 PM EST

    The Lions have been waiting all day...

    Since Sunday Night Football went to NBC in 2006, the Lions have appeared on NBC's marquee game just 13 times, one of the lowest numbers in the NFL. Their young stars, like Jameson Williams are used to the marquee spotlight, and are looking to move even closer to securing a playoff berth.

  • Sun, November 10, 2024 at 7:20 PM EST

    Texans inactives for Sunday Night Football

  • Sun, November 10, 2024 at 7:19 PM EST

    Lions inactives for Sunday Night Football
